title: Vi rant >:O
body:
Vi is way too OP

I just had a game with one, and she just kept on racking up kills. But here is the thing, she was unkillable. We went all-in on her 1v5 with a gank, and she managed to get a double kill before being killed.

She built tanky, with the only damage items being Tri-Force and her jungle item. The problem was though that she was still deleting champs with her abilities. She could 100-0 any champ (except me, I was tanky Zac) under tower even with three of us there to hard CC her.

How is this even possible?

replies.body: They just nerfed Vi's ult this last patch to do less damage. Although tbh it isn't much of a nerf. lvl 6 went from 200dmg to 150. lvl 11 went from 325 to 300. lvl 16 stayed the same. They also minorly nerfed her movement speed from 350 to 345
Yeah I know. I just seriously think that she is way too OP. Her ganks are good, with her dash and ult. She can build tanky and still deal tons of damage, or build damage and still be so tanky.

she is a brusier her w shreds tanks and squishes alike but a fed nasus is worse then vi and cc also destroys her so play amumu or someone who can cc her as she relies on q to get in and out of fights after ult is down I have beaten many vis I am a vi main myself so I know her weaknesses and Power spikes
Yeah, but that's the thing. She was a bruiser built tanks but BURSTED down all our team under turrets. I don't care what champ that is, that is BS

If she managed her sheen proc properly then I can see it being possible.

Correct me if I'm wrong, but I'm pretty sure her passive gives a shield when she hits somebody with a spell.

So sheen proc + shield managed well enough makes this entirely possible. It was obvious that she was ahead too, so that is a factor as well. Plus, ccing your team's damage/squishies could help too. Or I'm horribly wrong about this the whole time.

Better nerf Irelia :^)

Yeah, her Tri-Force and her shield must have been it. Saying that though, I Was Zac. I had a ton of knock ups and a slow, plus I ran exhaust and chilling smite, plus we had a Morganna. She lived through all of the CC, and still ulted  our ADC and one shot her with that, plus managing a beat down on Morg before the ADC ignite tick killed her.

I reckon Vi’s too easily fed, and can build a ton of defence while still scaling insanely well into the late game due to natural high scalings on almost all of her abilities. So if you want a nerf on Vi, I’m super down for that. She’s got the opposite of the fighter’s syndrome that Aatrox is suffering.

Aatrox = Builds damage, deals good damage but is too squishy/Builds tank and tanks eel but deals no damage.
Vi = Builds damage, gets naturally tanky/Builds tank, gets natural damage.

Wtf a fed bruiser killed 2 people and died when fed?

Wtf riot.
